item.title: The Beatles - Come Together
item.description: This ukulele lesson by Katie DeNure features a tutorial on how to play Come Together by the Beatles and a beautiful play along performed by her.

item.title: Ukulele lesson 1 - Anatomy of the Uke and Basic Technique
item.description: In this introductory ukulele lesson Erich Andreas shows you the anatomy of the ukulele, discusses left and right hand technique as well as picking and strumming.

item.title: Ukulele Lesson 2 - Open Chords
item.description: Justin Sandercoe's Ukulele Lesson 2 teaching the open chords: C, Cm, C7, F, Fm, F7, G, Gm, G7.

item.title: Bob Marley - Redemption Song
item.description: Tyler Austenfeld breaks down Redemption Song by Bob Marley: the intro, the verse and the chorus.

item.title: Beginner Tutorial on How To Strum the Ukulele
item.description: A beginner tutorial by Cynthia Lin on how to strum the ukulele.

item.title: How to Sing and Play Uke at the Same Time
item.description: A tutorial by Cynthia Lin on how to sing and play the ukulele at the same time.

item.title: Creep - Radiohead
item.description: The Ukulele Teacher shows how to play the popular song Creep by Radiohead on the Ukulele.

item.title: Sympathy for the Devil - The Rolling Stones
item.description: Tyler Austenfeld teaches how to play Sympathy for the Devil by The Rolling Stones on the Ukulele.

item.title: John Lennon - Imagine
item.description: Tyler Austenfeld teaches how to play Imagine by John Lennon on the Ukulele.

item.title: Fingerpicking Pattern #1 in 4/4 Timing
item.description: The first fingerpicking pattern for ukulele in 4/4 timing in a series of lessons teaching different patterns by Tyler from TenThumbsPro.
